data.title: WEDDINGS; Dana E. Brodsky, Bradley Sherman
data.text:
Dana Eve Brodsky, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Marvin Brodsky of Baldwin, L.I., is to be married today to Dr. Bradley Mark Sherman, a son of Dr. Elaine Schiffman also of Baldwin, and Eugene Sherman of New York. Rabbi Jo David is to perform the ceremony at the Cold Spring Country Club in Cold Spring Harbor, L.I.

The bride, 29, is a midwife at Birthplace, a private birthing center in Pittsburgh. She graduated from Cornell University and received a master's degree in public health from Columbia University. She also received bachelor's and master's degrees in nursing from Columbia. Her father is an electronics salesman in New York. Her mother is an early-childhood teacher at the Brandeis School in Lawrence, L.I.

The bridegroom, 31, is a fellow in gastroenterology at the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center in Pittsburgh. He graduated from Duke University and received his medical degree from New York Medical College. His mother is a professor of marketing and international business at Hofstra University in Hempstead, L.I. His father is a salesman at Kings Infiniti, an automobile dealership in Brooklyn. The bridegroom's stepfather, Dr. Leon Schiffman, is a professor of marketing at Baruch College in New York.
